RPhosFate 0.8.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Handbook
  • Papers
    • 2008: Best management practice applications
    • 2012: Phosphorus emission hotspots
    • 2019: Storm drains at road embankments
    • 2021: Particulate PhozzyLogic Index (PPLI)

An enhanced version of the PhosFate model implemented in R currently supporting suspended solids (SS) and particulate phosphorus (PP).

Installation

Currently, no CRAN release is planned. A Windows binary package built for Microsoft R Open 3.5.3 is nonetheless available from a drat repository. It can be installed along with its most important dependencies via the following command:

install.packages(
  c("RPhosFate", "raster"),
  repos = c("https://gisler.github.io/drat", options("repos")),
  type = "win.binary",
  dependencies = TRUE
)

Semantic Versioning

Releases of this project are versioned following the rules of SemVer.
